en.name: Luxurious Sea-Lord
en.passiveDescription: Increases Elemental Burst DMG by {{12%//15%//18%//21%//24%}}. When Elemental Burst hits opponents, there is a 100% chance of summoning a huge onrush of tuna that deals {{100%//125%//150%//175%//200%}} ATK as AoE DMG. This effect can occur once every 15s.

zh.name: 衔珠海皇
zh.passiveDescription: 元素爆发造成的伤害提升{{12%//15%//18%//21%//24%}}。元素爆发命中敌人时，有100%概率召唤大鲔冲击，造成{{100%//125%//150%//175%//200%}}攻击力的范围伤害。该效果每15秒至多触发一次。
